ValidationRule.description: Limit which Statuses are used when a record is cloned
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISNEW() && $Profile.Name = 'NSS Inbound Rep' && NOT(ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Pending')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Inbound Approved')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Inbound Re-Approved'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please pick a different status for this record.
